mapper.select:
select COUNT(1) as number,a.plateNumber from(SELECT plate as plateNumber, '24小时不定位' AS alarmType, operatType, color, company, systime, lastTime, lastlocateTime, offlineTime, createDate FROM baobiao_notlocatedetail WHERE company=#{deptName} and (offlineTimes>=86400 or offlineTimes is null) and createDate >= #{beginTime} and createDate <= #{endTime} ORDER BY offlineTimes desc
) a GROUP BY a.plateNumber
mapper.sql: SELECT a.*,b.plateNumber, b.color, b.company, b.OperatType, b.beginTime, b.endTime,b.KeepTime,b.limited AS xiansuzhi, CONCAT(b.ChaoSuBi, '%') AS chaosubi,b.Road_Name AS weizhi, CONCAT( (floor(b.KeepTime / 86400) % 24),'天',(floor(b.KeepTime / 3600) % 24),'时',(floor(b.KeepTime / 60) % 60),'分',(b.KeepTime % 60),'秒') AS keeptimeOne, CONCAT(#{beginTime},'至',#{endTime}) as createDate FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS chaosucisu, a.VehId, a.AlarmType, MAX(a.MaxSpeed) as maxspeed, CONCAT( (floor(SUM(KeepTime) / 86400) % 24),'天', ( floor(SUM(KeepTime) / 3600) % 24),'时',(floor(SUM(KeepTime) / 60) % 60), '分',(SUM(KeepTime) % 60),'秒') AS keeptimeShow, ( SELECT AlarmReportID FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime b WHERE maxSpeed = MAX(a.maxSpeed) AND CutoffTime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{beginTime}, '00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{endTime}, '23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND b.vehid = a.vehid AND b.AlarmType = a.AlarmType AND company = #{deptName} AND AlarmType = '超速报警' and passed = 100 and AnalyzeMode = 1 ORDER BY KeepTime DESC,Limited asc LIMIT 1 ) id FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime a WHERE 1 = 1 AND CutoffTime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{beginTime}, '00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{endTime}, '23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND company = #{deptName} AND AlarmType = '超速报警' and passed = 100 and AnalyzeMode = 1 GROUP BY a.VehId, a.AlarmType ) a INNER JOIN baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime b ON a.id = b.AlarmReportID

SELECT a.*,b.plateNumber, b.color, b.company, b.OperatType,b.beginTime, b.endTime,b.CutoffTime, b.KeepTime,b.Road_Name AS weizhi, CONCAT(#{beginTime},'至',#{endTime}) as createDate, CONCAT( (floor(b.KeepTime / 86400) % 24), '天', (floor(b.KeepTime / 3600) % 24), '时', (floor(b.KeepTime / 60) % 60), '分', (b.KeepTime % 60), '秒' ) AS keeptimeOne FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS pilaocisu, a.VehId, a.AlarmType, CONCAT( (floor(SUM(KeepTime) / 86400) % 24), '天',( floor(SUM(KeepTime) / 3600) % 24 ), '时', (floor(SUM(KeepTime) / 60) % 60), '分', (SUM(KeepTime) % 60), '秒' ) AS keeptimeShow, ( SELECT AlarmReportID FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime b WHERE b.VehId = a.VehId AND b.AlarmType = a.AlarmType AND company = #{deptName} AND AlarmType = '疲劳驾驶报警' and passed = 100 AND CutoffTime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{beginTime}, '00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{endTime}, '23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ORDER BY KeepTime DESC LIMIT 1 ) id FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime a WHERE 1 = 1 AND company = #{deptName} AND AlarmType = '疲劳驾驶报警' and passed = 100 and AnalyzeMode = 1 AND CutoffTime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{beginTime}, '00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{endTime}, '23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY a.VehId,a.AlarmType ) a INNER JOIN baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime b ON a.id = b.AlarmReportID
